title: Make your words more ＡＥＳＴＨＥＴＩＣ
author: jstewartmobile
content: readme.md your words more usage: [option]... options: -f input filename (uses stdin omitted) -h help: message notes: runs when stdin is tty. press ctrl+d send eof character exit.directionsinstall semi-recent versions gcc make your os.run .put path the binary somewhere your $path.why?figlet-style headingsput following your .vimrc, save:vnoremap <leader> :!<cr>reload vim config :source $myvimrc.select text visual mode, <leader> will transform selection.code pranks your fingertips$ ./ (press ctrl+d exit):> figlet-y headings> vaporwave> why you that?> testing, 1 2 3 4...
